sqlMap.select: select FILE_ID, FILE_CATALOG, FILE_NAME, FILE_NEW_NAME, FILE_PATH, ABSOLUTEPATH, FILE_SIZE, FILE_TYPE, FILE_TIME, FILE_SAVE, CONTENT, OPERATORID, OPERATORNAME, RELATION_ID, GROUP_ID, ATTACHMENT_SRC_ID, ATTACHMENT_SRC_CD from AT_FILEUPLOAD where FILE_ID = #fileId:VARCHAR#

select FILE_ID, FILE_CATALOG, FILE_NAME, FILE_NEW_NAME, FILE_PATH, ABSOLUTEPATH, FILE_SIZE, FILE_TYPE, FILE_TIME, FILE_SAVE, CONTENT, OPERATORID, OPERATORNAME, RELATION_ID, GROUP_ID, ATTACHMENT_SRC_ID, ATTACHMENT_SRC_CD from AT_FILEUPLOAD
order by $orderByClause$
sqlMap.insert:
select SEQ_ABF_SYS.nextval from dual
insert into AT_FILEUPLOAD (FILE_ID, FILE_CATALOG, FILE_NAME, FILE_NEW_NAME, FILE_PATH, ABSOLUTEPATH, FILE_SIZE, FILE_TYPE, FILE_TIME, FILE_SAVE, CONTENT, OPERATORID, OPERATORNAME, RELATION_ID, GROUP_ID, ATTACHMENT_SRC_ID, ATTACHMENT_SRC_CD) values (#fileId:VARCHAR#, #fileCatalog:VARCHAR#, #fileName:VARCHAR#, #fileNewName:VARCHAR#, #filePath:VARCHAR#, #absolutepath:VARCHAR#, #fileSize:DECIMAL:-9999#, #fileType:VARCHAR#, #fileTime:TIMESTAMP#, #fileSave:CHAR#, #content:BLOB#, #operatorid:DECIMAL:-9999#, #operatorname:VARCHAR#, #relationId:VARCHAR#, #groupId:VARCHAR#, #attachmentSrcId:VARCHAR#, #attachmentSrcCd:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update: update AT_FILEUPLOAD set FILE_CATALOG = #fileCatalog:VARCHAR#, FILE_NAME = #fileName:VARCHAR#, FILE_NEW_NAME = #fileNewName:VARCHAR#, FILE_PATH = #filePath:VARCHAR#, ABSOLUTEPATH = #absolutepath:VARCHAR#, FILE_SIZE = #fileSize:DECIMAL#, FILE_TYPE = #fileType:VARCHAR#, FILE_TIME = #fileTime:TIMESTAMP#, FILE_SAVE = #fileSave:CHAR#, CONTENT = #content:BLOB#, OPERATORID = #operatorid:DECIMAL#, OPERATORNAME = #operatorname:VARCHAR#, RELATION_ID = #relationId:VARCHAR#, GROUP_ID = #groupId:VARCHAR#, ATTACHMENT_SRC_ID = #attachmentSrcId:VARCHAR#, ATTACHMENT_SRC_CD = #attachmentSrcCd:VARCHAR# where FILE_ID = #fileId:VARCHAR#

update AT_FILEUPLOAD
FILE_CATALOG = #fileCatalog:VARCHAR#
FILE_NAME = #fileName:VARCHAR#
FILE_NEW_NAME = #fileNewName:VARCHAR#
FILE_PATH = #filePath:VARCHAR#
ABSOLUTEPATH = #absolutepath:VARCHAR#
FILE_SIZE = #fileSize:DECIMAL#
FILE_TYPE = #fileType:VARCHAR#
FILE_TIME = #fileTime:TIMESTAMP#
FILE_SAVE = #fileSave:CHAR#
CONTENT = #content:BLOB#
OPERATORID = #operatorid:DECIMAL#
OPERATORNAME = #operatorname:VARCHAR#
RELATION_ID = #relationId:VARCHAR#
GROUP_ID = #groupId:VARCHAR#
ATTACHMENT_SRC_ID = #attachmentSrcId:VARCHAR#
ATTACHMENT_SRC_CD = #attachmentSrcCd:VARCHAR#
where FILE_ID = #fileId:VARCHAR#

update AT_FILEUPLOAD
FILE_ID = #record.fileId:VARCHAR#
FILE_CATALOG = #record.fileCatalog:VARCHAR#
FILE_NAME = #record.fileName:VARCHAR#
FILE_NEW_NAME = #record.fileNewName:VARCHAR#
FILE_PATH = #record.filePath:VARCHAR#
ABSOLUTEPATH = #record.absolutepath:VARCHAR#
FILE_SIZE = #record.fileSize:DECIMAL:-9999#
FILE_TYPE = #record.fileType:VARCHAR#
FILE_TIME = #record.fileTime:TIMESTAMP#
FILE_SAVE = #record.fileSave:CHAR#
CONTENT = #record.content:OTHER#
OPERATORID = #record.operatorid:DECIMAL:-9999#
OPERATORNAME = #record.operatorname:VARCHAR#
RELATION_ID = #record.relationId:VARCHAR#
GROUP_ID = #record.groupId:VARCHAR#
ATTACHMENT_SRC_ID = #record.attachmentSrcId:VARCHAR#
ATTACHMENT_SRC_CD = #record.attachmentSrcCd:VARCHAR#

update AT_FILEUPLOAD set FILE_ID = #record.fileId:VARCHAR#, FILE_CATALOG = #record.fileCatalog:VARCHAR#, FILE_NAME = #record.fileName:VARCHAR#, FILE_NEW_NAME = #record.fileNewName:VARCHAR#, FILE_PATH = #record.filePath:VARCHAR#, ABSOLUTEPATH = #record.absolutepath:VARCHAR#, FILE_SIZE = #record.fileSize:DECIMAL:-9999#, FILE_TYPE = #record.fileType:VARCHAR#, FILE_TIME = #record.fileTime:TIMESTAMP#, FILE_SAVE = #record.fileSave:CHAR#, CONTENT = #record.content:OTHER#, OPERATORID = #record.operatorid:DECIMAL:-9999#, OPERATORNAME = #record.operatorname:VARCHAR#, RELATION_ID = #record.relationId:VARCHAR#, GROUP_ID = #record.groupId:VARCHAR#, ATTACHMENT_SRC_ID = #record.attachmentSrcId:VARCHAR#, ATTACHMENT_SRC_CD = #record.attachmentSrcCd:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select:
